text: Jack Harold Paar (May 1, 1918 â€“ January 27, 2004) was an American author, radio and television comedian and talk show host. He is best known as host of The Tonight Show from 1957 to 1962. He was born in Canton, Ohio. Paar died in Greenwich, Connecticut from a stroke, aged 85. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1918 births Category:2004 deaths Category:American television talk show hosts Category:Comedians from Ohio Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Television personalities from Ohio Category:Writers from Ohio Category:People from Canton, Ohio
